abstract: An exchange between reporters and the White House press secretary shows how awkward the prospects of a nomination fight between Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Hillary Rodham Clinton would be for President Obama.

headline.main: Potential Joe Biden Run Puts White House in a Bind
headline.print_headline: Possible Run by Biden Puts Obama on Spot

snippet: An exchange between reporters and the White House press secretary shows how awkward the prospects of a nomination fight between Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Hillary Rodham Clinton would be for President Obama.
